website_summaries.verdict: A handcrafted leather cover and strap give this multi-use journal an old-world feel.
pros: Hand bound spine with recycled cotton paper, making it tree-free and acid-free
Can be used for sketching, journaling, bullet journaling, or a mixture of all three
cons: Blank pages can make it difficult to write in a straight line

customer_reviews.title: This journal is THE ONE.
customer_reviews.text: If you are hesitating on buying yet ANOTHER journal you're afraid will sit on your shelf collecting dust with only four scribbled words on the first page...stop. As a notorious hoarder of mostly blank journals, I can honestly say, this will be the one that breaks your habit. It's not some prissy little book too expensive and gorgeous to write in. It damn near begs you to scar it with your chicken scratch, and it doesn't fall apart when you get pissed off at the universe and chuck it at the wall. All jokes aside, stop scrolling through reviews, add one (or ten) of these to your shopping cart, and enjoy knowing you will never regret that you did.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bingham

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I play dungeons and dragons and all my character sheets are now written in this journal. Only thing I wished is that you could easily replace pages. But I won't let that detract from the stars I give the product because I was already aware of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: DrHanSoloMDTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Much below expectation
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the large numbers of good reviews fooled you. The product WAS NOT as expected. Especially the paper was not of good quality. Mine looked old and seasoned....with stained on some pages. Already contacted the seller and promised to send a brand new one.....the replacement product never arrived. I was then abroad and was not able to follow it up. I should have returned the product and asked for full refund......It wasn't even giftable...I also bought other LEATHER JOURNAL from other manufacturer and the quality was far better for a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: NAE

customer_reviews.title: Great Journal
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a journal that I could use to record thoughts & ideas, as well as draw the random picture or doodle. This journal is perfect for either one. The pages are a great size for writing or drawing, and the paper is great for drawing. I'm not sure I would try using water colors or colored markers on the paper, but I think anything that isn't too wet would work fine. I really like the leather cover which gives it a great feel and sturdiness. It arrives packed in a cloth bag which I also thought was pretty cool. Overall, I really like this journal.
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: Moldy and disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Just received this, opened it up, and took these pictures right away. Covered in mold and mildew - everywhere - front cover, back cover, and inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Eyyyyyyyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: Would this be cooler if there was a withered, snarling face on one side of the binding? Of course. As it stands, though, the craftsmanship is solid, the pages seem pretty secure in the book, and it smells like how I imagine the Fonz would. The only surprise was that the pages were grouped in little sections as part of the binding, so it looks like you have 5 mini journals within. It was perfect though, for my five-part novel on the Fonz.
customer_reviews.author: Trending Upward

customer_reviews.title: Good Book. Not as pretty as the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Its basically a big sheet of brown leather. There is no texture and color variation like in the picture. It's all the same color of dark brown. No wrinkles as seen in pictures posted by the seller and other reviewers. They received a much more aesthetically pleasing book than I did. I'm not happy with my purchase and will probably look for a company with better quality control in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leather writing journal
customer_reviews.text: Son wanted a journal for Christmas and wanted a rustic leather bound book. I liked the image and simple construction and specifically looked for one that would accept replacement writing tablets. This journal worked perfectly. With a little effort, the paper pads can be replaced. The leather is a good quality and appears as in the photo with distressed areas giving the book some character right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: captain moore

customer_reviews.title: Very Good gift choice!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, seemed a little small, BUT purchased as a gift for my grandson who thinks it is "amazing" and loves it, as does my son, his father teasing he would sneak it away. They liked the "smell" of the leather, and my GS likes the winding closure. Talented in art, things like the "Celtic Knot" attract his attention, so this was a major hit for Christmas, and I thank you.
customer_reviews.author: nvj3wlv

customer_reviews.title: Best journal I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This journal by Moonster is fantastic. The leather is genuine, soft, and unique! As stated in the card that’s included with the nice sashe “Made from 100% Natural Leather, our products can vary in look & shade, producing a beautifully unique item - no two are ever the same!” The cotton-like paper is of an amazing quality. The journal feels as if you can do anything to it and it’ll never give. Beautiful leather, beautiful paper. The 1 year free replacement insurance is probably one of the best warranties I’ve ever seen as well! I would seriously recommend this journal to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention of making it into a small Book of Shadows for myself. I ended up doing this! It would also be perfect for a sketchbook or journal. The leather is very soft. Looks antique. The pages are nicely made, but I wouldn't use eraser on them too much. The page binding is very sturdy, none of my pages have fallen out or look like they will (the book is not refillable). The would recommend this to someone looking for a rustic looking book to draw or write in! I would buy again!! Happy journaling!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The perfect journal!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous journal. Glad I got the larger version, perfect amount of space for writing and doodling. The cover is supple and the leather smells great. The pages are thick and take to various inks well. I tried ball and gel inks and prefer the gel simply because you wont leave as deep an imprint on the other side. I love the overall look and feel of this journal, its like something out of medieval times!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Used this notebook for a project- love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 8 x 6 notebook and absolutely love it. It's beautiful and I was able to use it for a travel scrapbook project. The pages were large enough to fit 4 x 6 pictures and still have room to write captions or doodle. The paper was also thick enough that the fine-point Sharpies I used didn't bleed through. It was also easy to remove extra unneeded pages- I just untied the leather binding cords and retied them when finished. I would definitely recommend this notebook for any type of journaling or special project.
customer_reviews.author: guest

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, crappy paper
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would love this just for the look and feel of the leather case, which are both top notch. The paper, however, sucks. Very textured, easy to tear, difficult for use with any kind of pencil and not so wonderful even with a pen. I wish it had better paper or I could at least change out the paper because I love the case. Alas, this is being used for grocery lists and the like because using it as a sketch book just isn't going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Sunchine

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expecations
customer_reviews.text: This journal is absolutely gorgeous. I was inspired to start writing after playing Red Dead Redemption 2. If Arthur Morgan can do it, so can I! But seriously, the leather feels and looks great. The paper has a rustic look/feel to it. Usually when I review something I just say if it's good or bad, but this journal is seriously amazing. A great buy, and if/when I run out of pages, I will definitely be buying a second one to continue my writing. Fantastic value. 11/10
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: Did not come in/ with a box, did not come with “pen”. Was disappointed when arrived-for the price expected more. Had hoped it would be a hit as Christmas gift, but both the recipient and I weren’t impressed :(
customer_reviews.author: Hope4usyet

customer_reviews.title: I am in Love with this journal
customer_reviews.text: The Journal is everything I wanted and More!! If you are buying it to sketch in I might suggest a quick coat of sealer so it will erase with no problem, if the need be. I have used inks, water colors, markers, stencils with paste, all after I gave it a quick coat of sealer. I am in Love with this journal, I also love that some of the proceeds go to help children, the price is amazing too! For me it's a win win and yes I will be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Barry

customer_reviews.title: What a surprising treasure to own!!
customer_reviews.text: This journal is fabulous, more beautiful than the description. It feels like something I've owned forever. The cotton paper is wonderful quality. The individual journals inside make it so unique compared to the average journal. The leather is soft and buttery, with markings that make it appear aged, like it's been passed down for generations. It fits easily in my handbag, I carry a large tote. It lays open fairly flat also considering it is new. I am sure it will grow more supple and flexible with age. I purchased two, one for myself and one for my adult daughter. She adores hers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Hooray for hand-bound leather goods benefiting some country in Africa that I know nothing about.
customer_reviews.text: As far as writing goes, you can find anything to do it on basically. A pencil and paper, a rock and another rock, a chisel and some more rock, a pen and a bathroom wall. This is a good Journal. It's 25 bucks, which is a little pricey, but this is something I'm going to keep around as opposed to one of those composition notebooks that I've filled up innumerable amounts of, and lose. It means something to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful journal!
customer_reviews.text: This journal is everything I needed it to be. It has a rustic, old-fashioned feel to it, it's soft, and the leather is supple. My only issues when I received it was the odor, which did go away after a day or two, and the staining of the very first/last pages from the leather. There was tissue paper between the leather and the first/last pages, but that didn't stop whatever they used to treat the leather from seeping into those pages. Overall though, would highly recommend this, and when I fill mine, I'll probably buy another!
customer_reviews.author: lenthatswho

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first journal I have purchased and didn't know quite what to expect. I was thinking it's a book with pages not anything special but when I opened up the package I was pleasantly surprised. The quality of the leather and the pages was really surprising. This should last me forever just a shame the pages won't last forever. When this gets full I will definitely order another one. I would like to have the 6x8 as well maybe when this is full I will get me that one. I would definitely recommend this to anybody. I don't think you will find a reason to not like this and to not purchase it
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted, exceptional quality!
customer_reviews.text: The exceptional quality of the leather is surpassed by none other and the paper quality is magnificent! I love this journal on so many levels! The fact that the journal also represents a family owned business who are helping children in Zambia, Africa, as they donate a percentage of thier profits to Tehila, a Non-Profit Organisation that promotes the prevention of child cruelty is just icing on the cake! I will be ordering many more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather binding...not crazy about the insertion of the paper...
customer_reviews.text: I needed another journal to start my creative process again...This caught my eye and I like that part of the money goes to help a charity...It is large enough...Has enough heft...Two problems that are irritating me but I will live with them...Leaves of paper are slipping out randomly from the journal... and the leather tie does not do the best at binding up this journal...I will see how it goes as I progress along in this...Hopefully no more paper comes out of the journal...I love the blank pages...just waiting to be filled with drawings...thoughts...memories...stories...
customer_reviews.author: BelleBelle

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight/sniff
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal. There's not a single thing I don't like about it! It looks well loved right out of the cotton sack it comes on. It smells of leather. The pages are signatures, sewn in. The size is very nice to drop in an art bag or a purse. It's a beautiful thing! I kind of wish I had ordered a bigger one as well. Maybe next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, soft, supple with an absolute handmade feel
customer_reviews.text: ordered this journal and 1 other type to try out. am really really pleased with this one.. color is a true brown (though i am sure there are variations). the cover is soft and supple and is my absolute idea of a personal journal. the paper is soft and lovely. i can't wait to begin writing in this book. i will be also looking to see if it comes in a slightly larger size, though this one certainly feels good in hand.. i'd buy this again and can see it will be well used.
customer_reviews.author: sandra s brandes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well-made
customer_reviews.text: My journals arrived promptly, well packaged and in excellent condition. The journals are beautiful and well-made. The leather is of premium quality and has no scuffs or stains. The paper is thick and beautiful. These journals makes one want to drop everything, sit down and start writing. Bought as gifts and were both loved and appreciated by the lucky recipients. I hope someone is thoughtful enough to bring me one of those one day.
customer_reviews.author: Intelligent Reader

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the hype
customer_reviews.text: The paper in this journal is pretty crummy. My fountain pen just tears it up, and I'm still hunting for a pen that writes on it in any satisfying way. The binding is also fairly touchy, and I've got a few torn pages just from opening it. I bought this as a journal to take I to some rugged situations, but it isn't even surviving my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding leather journal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and I couldn't be more pleased with them. I wanted a rustic journal like this but had a hard time finding one without beads, stones, embossing, feathers, etc...... This is perfect...the leather is soft and very high quality..and the paper is wonderful, has a nice feel to it. I love that its NOT refillable... Don't hesitate to order one (or more) of these...you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Missy H

customer_reviews.title: Very nice leather.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself and one for a friend. I just love using this as a travel journal. They did have a bit of a damp smell when they arrived but, I added some dried lavender to the bags and after a few days it was gone. The thick leather covers are very nice. The paper is rustic but very nice to right on. All in all I am happy with my purchase. Minus the smell upon opening. If you are giving this as a gift, I highly recommend opening the package completely before wrapping. Just in case yours needs to be aired out as well.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L NORRBOM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Leather Journals!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased both the 7x5 and the 8x6 leather journals. Both are beautiful and unique looking. Both are filled with unlined, cotton paper. I just love the feel of writing on cotton paper. I use the 7x5 journal for my daily writing and the 8x6 one for more reflective writings. These journals feel good in your hands, smell wonderful, and are ruggedly made. Each comes in it's own drawstring pouch. I love these journals and will definitely purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so nice!!
customer_reviews.text: love this so much! it is a super awesome journal and definitely a great purchase. one thing i wanted to put out there because i bought this for doodling and just feeling a little fancy with the leather and all but the paper is not eraser friendly. when i tried to erase the pencil from the paper, the paper kinda just deteriorated. some pens also don’t write on it very well but it’s adaptable. just thought i’d mention that(: still an awesome purchase thooo
customer_reviews.author: laxbro

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: i realy like this notebook, i got it because spiral/glue notebooks tend to rip apart when being tossed around at work from truck to bag to pocket. it is real leather. it looks nice, smells nice, and feels nice. people say its not refillable but i dont see why, its a simple weave and 2 knots. i have already refilled it. the only thing u have to do is be careful not to break the leather straps
customer_reviews.author: FiReWaTeR

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for, but better!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im so happy with my journal! Its extremely well made, beautiful, and i love the paper. Another bonus is there are 5 "sections" so no need to 'tab" or use divider of some sort. It all flows freely, only i can see the diff sections(?) also the way they have paper attached, the pages will always be "safe". In the past, ive had a hard time keeping up and doing a daily journal, but w this one...i cant not. Its truly beautiful and very well made and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Will order again and again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal. I haven't been able to put it down. I write in it multiple times a day. I even rewrote what I had in my other journal into this one because I love it so much. Definitely will order again. Soft leather and lovely unlined paper. Perfect for writing or sketching or taking notes or whatever your heart desires. I'm about to make another purchase because it's 2/3rds full already. Just because I write so much. There is plenty of paper. I have always wanted a journal like this. My wish has been fulfilled. :) It is a wonderful product and I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: lorie

customer_reviews.title: This is beyond amazing. It was bought for my brother n law ...
customer_reviews.text: This is beyond amazing. It was bought for my brother n law who wanted a journal for Christmas. It was so soft! The paper inside it thick but not too thick. I love that this is environment and animal friendly. I was super jealous of my brother n law the second it came in and I had it in my hands. I will be ordering another one for my best friend who wants to journal are International trips. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Solid leather bound journal
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal. It has been by my bedside for 2 years now and is holding up great. I love the way it looks and the feel of the leather. The patina is beautiful and ages well; the binding is sturdy, and there’s a heaviness about it that gives it that quality feel. I know I’ll treasure this journal and the memories it holds for the rest of my life. I’m getting close to the end of the pages so I will definitely be ordering another one very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the journal. I am using it as a daily sketch journal. I am not a fan of the paper. I wanted to use it for copic markers. Great for drawings though. Good for gouache or watercolor. Dont use heavy washes though.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Incredible craftsmanship at a phenomenal price!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it was possible to get this kind of craftsmanship for the price I paid. This journal is absolutely outstanding in every way, from the beautiful weather to the pages themselves. I'm beyond pleased with my purchase and will recommend this product to anyone who will listen!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morris

customer_reviews.title: this thing was more awesome than advertised
customer_reviews.text: this thing was more awesome than advertised. the smell and the feel are just so wonderful. as advertised, there were minor cosmetic differences in the cover, but the shape is overall the same. this thing is beautiful. if youre looking for something simple, go no further.
customer_reviews.author: Korr

customer_reviews.title: This is just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many travel journals and bullet journals and this one is by far my favorite ever! I will buy another one when I fill this. The size is just right. I can fit a lot of content into the book but it also fits into my small, but not compact, purse. The cover is roomy enough that I can actually add things to it and it will still close easily. Very impressed. I also love the little bag that it came in
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Pickles

customer_reviews.title: It feels nice, the pages are nice & thick
customer_reviews.text: When i opened it i thought it was elegant. I think i wouldve preferred one without the wrap around strap but that is personal opinion not fact about the item. It feels nice, the pages are nice & thick. I purchased this as a gift for my cousin who loved it and sends me pics still 3 months later of how much she loves it & uses it alot for her ideas & thoughts on creative projects or as a sketch book & creative writting journal. She says having it brings her inspiration from its elegance.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather journal!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and was amazed at the quality when it arrived. The leather is genuine and beautiful. It has a solid strap to keep it closed when not in use. The journal also had a protector sheet (removable) to protect the first page from leather bleeding or stains. I like the thickness of the paper as well and I'm confident even sharpies won't bleed through. I would recommend this to anyone who likes unlined journals that are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Mia B

customer_reviews.title: 5 star quality, 1 star practicality.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to fall in love with this journal, but it is ending up not being right for me. It’s gorgeous, 5 stars on looks, quality, and craftsmanship for sure. - it’s so thick compared to the page size it makes it hard to write, especially on the left side pages. - it opens a little awkwardly, with the big flap being on the right side and the log string hanging down I think this would be PERFECT as an 8x10 at half the thickness.
customer_reviews.author: sadsally

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a teen
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter saw this at an art museum and wanted it desperately. I found it later for her birthday a little cheaper on amazon. It has a great handcrafted look with nice paper. You can replace the paper too which is great, although I don't expect to do that for awhile. She is using it for journaling and song writing and loves the look.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed. The journal is actually nice but I believe they make them on the ground or something. Pages were lightly stained, dirty and when I took it off the bag the back of it was covered in some sort of sand. It was for a gift so I couldn’t give something like that to anyone. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd journal purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Moonster journal I have purchased. The first was for me to use for watercolor. It works well but keep in mind it is not watercolor paper and definitely absorbs faster but I love it and when I fill my first I will get another. The 2nd journal I bought is for my son. He really liked mine when he saw it and asked for one for his writing. He is thrilled with it. I also plan to get a few more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: nameless

customer_reviews.title: unique gift for the Graduate
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to a college graduate who is going into theater production and really liked the uniqueness of this journal as it had provision for sketching as well as journaling plus it is refillable. The cover was loved for its unusual material and design. He liked it immensely. For once I made a great selection.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Moonster Leather Journal
customer_reviews.text: The journal it work of art. The leather is soft and supple and slightly distressed, giving it an old world look. The binding appears to be strong and should last. The pages are made out of a high grade, almost cotton-like material and the gel pen I purchased to write in the journal flows across the paper like butter. The strap is nice and long and also serves as a bookmark when needed. This would make a great gift for someone special as well. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mommamia1217

customer_reviews.title: SO worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite journal I've ever owned. Will buy again in the future. I wish I ordered the two pack. Beautiful quality of leather cover and of pages. Love this so much. Thank you for a great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what it is, great binding, great paper that will work with even bold nib fountain pens and have no bleed through
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore this. I’m going to handwrite a book in pencil and ink over it, then erase the pencil. Writing a story about my girlfriend and myself, and how our relationship has been, and how I hope it will end up. She’ll love it, she’s a book collector, and fanatical for handwritten books. This is perfect. I just need to complete the story and make sure it fills the whole notebook. :) Thanks you! Beautiful leather, great smell, and the pages are almost cloth. They definitely won’t bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Journaling
customer_reviews.text: The leather is thick, yet supple and a gorgeous brown. The paper is also thick but not stiff, it is easy to turn the pages, and the pages do not stick together. The pages are well secured with the binding. When writing on the pages, the paper accepts the ink well and the letters are smooth and do not bleed. There is not anything about this journal I dislike. Happy journaling to all who purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality materials, will buy again in the future!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive quality of leather and paper. I'm a big fan of the distressed look and softness of the leather. The only issue I have is the embossed logo on the back of the book. I'm using this as a prop for a film and the logo takes away the "realism" of the product. Maybe in the future have the logo as a sticker, or something on the inside back cover? Overall great product and I would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Madison S.

customer_reviews.title: You will love it. It’s absolutely beautiful. !!! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: It’s so beautiful and totally worth the money. The craftsmanship put into this is remarkable. Idk how to attach a picture anymore so I can show you how beautiful it really looks but take my word for it , you will love it. It even comes with a little added gift. Don’t pass this up, if your looking for a lovely gift For a loved one or for a beautiful journal for yourself this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Charles & Rosanna Kaelble

customer_reviews.title: A very high quality journal
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected fake leather or paper thin authentic leather that would not hold up under use. However, the quality of this journal far exceeded my expectations. I routinely have paid two to three times as much for journals of similar quality. I highly recommend this journal with no reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for those who want to live longer
customer_reviews.text: I'm 84 years old - determined to reach 100 by reducing High Stress and occasionally do a Fast. Both require a diary to record progress and note new ideas coming from doctors challenging junk food, cancers and diabetes. Not only are such dangers proven to be overcome but it's also less expensive while making life more pleasant. The diary helps to record positive progress.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Parky

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I researched for days for a new journal (for the new year) and in leather. I couldn’t spend too much nor did I want to order something and it not be what I expected. I did that once before on a leather journal. It was way smaller than I expected. This one was not. This journal is beautiful and perfect size for my hand to write and also to carry around. For the price I feel so justified in ordering it. I’ll definitely be ordering this same journal again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea HK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect classy leather journal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very special leather journal! I got it for my daughter's creative artsy boyfriend and he loved it! So did everybody else at Christmas I got it very quickly and it was wrapped up very nicely in it's own material drawstring bag!! I love the smell of leather, this journal will last for a long time and will probobly only be used on certain occasions!!
customer_reviews.author: tltoler5362

customer_reviews.title: Super soft paper, erase gently. True to photo.
customer_reviews.text: Paper is really soft not ideal if you're going to be doing any vigorous erasing. You can erase things if you do it lightly and don't go crazy and only go in One Direction don't go and swirls LOL LOL still a lovely lovely book I may end up buying one for myself as well Trisha picture nice leather good amount of paper
customer_reviews.author: joyce l.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & so functional
customer_reviews.text: Super nice journal. I am using it for drawing and dreams. It looks nice on my nightstand and is so handy. I have a couple moonstone journals and the quality is superb on all models. The paper is so nice and the leather feels like good quality. I’m no artist but I feel like my simple drawings look even better on this paper. I would definitely recommend. This size would make a perfect travel companion.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H-D

customer_reviews.title: This journal is perfect for drawers/writers/anyone!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look and feel of this journal! The pages are nice and sturdy enough for pens or markers so you can get super creative if you would like, I plan on writing and drawing in it every day. This would honestly make a great gift to anyone especially because no two journals look alike, making it more special and rare. I love the antique looking brown leather, the company did a great job with it! Whether you’re a drawer or a writing or even if you’re barely getting into journaling, (like I am) this is the perfect journal to start with!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather and great paper to write on with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather and great paper to write on with a fountain pen. The only think I didn't like was the leather thin strap that is suppose to keep the journal closed - it does not tie, and becomes unraveled every time. I suggest a clasp.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Collazo

customer_reviews.title: A big winner
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's awesome it be perfect if it was more like a 9 inch just a little bit larger and it'd be great if it had an inside pen holder but that would make it five stars but I can easily put a pen inside and it holds perfectly and I can even clip it on the inside flap or the outside so that's no big deal I just wish it was a little bit bigger but it smells so good you can tell this is quality I'm definitely keeping this one
customer_reviews.author: VENOMnVIPER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! As an author, I am a "journal snob"...very picky about the quality, style, and durability of a hand-made journal that feels comfortable from the start. This is by far one of the best journals I have ever owned. I will definitely be buying more! And thank you for pouring into the lives of our young people around the world!
customer_reviews.author: xdea

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! Absolutely stunning and the smell is great ! Side note, no lines in this h Journal, I like that but some might not. Also get a tape measure and make sure you realize the size, I wish I had ordered the larger one but that’s my own fault for not checking to see how big it was
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality inn customer service
customer_reviews.text: The original journals that I received had a very strong pungent leather smell to it. They were very kind and replacing it for me and their customer service was it just amazing and warm! You don't come across people like this these days so I am very thankful to have purchase such a beautiful quality journal
customer_reviews.author: Rissa85

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy about getting the 8x6 journal but I am glad I did! This journal is so beautiful, the soft but sturdy leather surrounding the journal makes it look amazing. The pages inside are thick. I wasn't to sure about the strap because I thought the journal would be to loosely held but I was pleasantly surprised it stays closed just fine without much give. I originally bought this as a gift for a friend but I will end up ordering more in the future for myself. The quality is beyond what I imagined and this is the perfect size to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just my size.
customer_reviews.text: Love this journal! It is just the right size for me. Just want to jot down ideas and things I did for the day. Perfect. Bought an inexpensive fountain pen to complete my Hobbit journal experience. Going to buy a second one as I’m retiring soon and will have more time to write.
customer_reviews.author: DianaC- retired IAgardener

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather but difficult pages to write on
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter expressed interest in beginning a journal and having a place to draw her cartoon creations. She fell in love with this one online. The look of it is beautifully worn leather and has plenty of pages to fill. My only critique is that the pages tear easily under any kind of fine tip pencil and fray under fine tip markers or pens. This is definately for a lighter hand with softer writing materials. 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: jhmom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice journal. My friend wants one now too. He loves the texture of the pages and the leather. It is built very well. Has a great smell and antique look to it. The pages are soft and thicker. Holds up well with pencil and pens... you could use watercolor, lightly to be honest. I also like that my money is also helping a cause as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Ski

customer_reviews.title: Book of Secrets,...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I purchased this product. I guess I looked the look reminded me of a book from Game of Thrones. I took advantage of the special offer and purchased two books. Gave one to my wife,.. she was slightly confused looking at the book but opened it and started taking measurements for her next project. I guess a little inspiration goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Old-World Looking Journal
customer_reviews.text: This is a good-quality notebook with a nice feel with the leather cover. The paper is thick and combined with the leather cover and closing strap gives it an old-world feel. I got this for $17.90 during a Black Friday deal vs its normal price of $24.95 – the lower price seems about right vs $25 for this one. If you like the journals with real leather and a rustic look, and the price goes down, I would give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: This is an absolutely beautiful journal. I used it as the sign-in book ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful journal. I used it as the sign-in book at my wedding (which had a nautical theme and to me this looked like it could easily be a captain's journal from the 1800s). It looks like the pages could be replaced once the journal is full.
customer_reviews.author: junebuggy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous, can’t beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this beautiful piece of craftsmanship to use as a private journal, and I couldn’t be happier. The paper reminds me a lot of Arches Cold Press (look up the price on that...) and it’s incredibly well bound, perfectly machined, and the leather is as soft as silk, while maintaining durability. I’ll be purchasing another when this one is full.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely gorgeous, just gorgeous. The leather is soft, the pages are thick and quality. I purchased this as a wedding gift for my fiancé on our wedding day. I wanted us to have a special place for us to write our "bucket list" of things to do as a couple. A book of things to look forward to. A book to add to through the years and a book to look back on to remember the good times. This journal is the absolute perfect journal for this; strong, beautiful, classic and quality. I am extremely happy with this journal!
customer_reviews.author: justagirl

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! WORKS FOR REAL USE OR PROP!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing craftsmanship! Bought this for a prop for my D&D party members (I'm the DM) and this really makes everything work in my favor. Mix this with writing using a Fountain pen and boy do you have a winner. Paper is amazing, leather is durable, and the strap is long enough to string things up. 10/10, I'm buying another one! (Mobile picture uploads are weird so if they are sideways I'm sorry.)
customer_reviews.author: MJ Rookie

customer_reviews.title: This product is very nicely made, I love the smell of real leather
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nicely made, I love the smell of real leather. The paper inside is like parchment paper. I have been looking for a special journal for certain writings , and my my I found the perfect journal. I absolutely love this journal,or what ever someone else uses it for. But for me it is very special. And for the family whom made this. The best of luck in your endeavor
customer_reviews.author: Donna Packer-Shupe

customer_reviews.title: Great Book, Love It!
customer_reviews.text: These are just great for what they are, perfect. I really like the 5-7, the 6-8 is bulkier and noticeably heavier. But, I like them both for sketching, some paste up and light wash type water color, I use a plastic page or 140 weight blotter in between because you get some bleed etc with certain inks or washes. So then one side but then back good for some paste up once dry.
customer_reviews.author: MisterBigDave

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs.
customer_reviews.text: According to the seller, this is a uniquely handcrafted journal. The leather feels and smells authentic, the paper is thick and my fine liner, frixion erasable and G2 gel pens did not bleed through. The pages looks like they are not truly aligned but it actually adds to its rustic charm. The paper smells but I’m going to try and let it air out and see if that will improve. Over all, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gogo Natayo

customer_reviews.title: I feel like Indiana Jones with my new lawn maintenance notebook
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this notebook to track my lawn maintenance project over the next year. I love the quality of the pages and the feel of the leather. I'm able to open the notebook and quickly jot down important ideas and to draw out what I am doing. It feels great in my hands and I have noticed that my wife looks at me with a hint more desire as I write down my ideas. I will be ordering more of these for myself and as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: The Best Leather Journal I've Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this journal along with 4 different journals from different sellers. This one buy far was the best. The others are very stiff and dont stay open unless you add pressure on the front. The pages are too stiff and you have to bend them to stay open but these pages are thick but pliable. The leather is soft and the construction is good and sturdy. I will be buying more of these as I gave all the other ones away as gifts. This one cost a bit more but totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a journal with the style and craftsmanship to carry and collect your passions, prayers, and thoughts, this is it. It is inspiring just sitting on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality!
customer_reviews.text: This book caught my eye because of how authentic it looked. I am a ’pen to paper’ type of writer so I was really drawn in. I was really surprised by the quality of the entire journal when it arrived and how it has lasted as I have used it all this time. I held off on my review for this reason but it has held up very well so I decided to share my opinion. It would make a great gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Good but please listen
customer_reviews.text: Great little book. I'm new to journaling so it wanted something that was personal and different from going to Walmart and picking up a 99 cent notebook(nothing against it)...smells wonderful only thing is the package it came in was opened the driver's explained that he had to deliver it regardless of the condition or else he'd be in trouble...though I believe he should have had the option to contact management take pictures and submits some kind of voucher clearing him from any accusations. There are people that regardless of what you say blame driver's and companies with things that they are unaware of, instead of having him deliver it as is.
customer_reviews.author: hasani white

customer_reviews.title: Absolutley love it
customer_reviews.text: I like to buy journals and notebooks and I have many hardly ever fully used. I have never had a nicer notebook / journal then this one, absolutley love it. Feels very expensive, paper quality is really great, a true artisan piece, perfect for everyone that likes to keep notes with style and hold on to them.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Journal, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen journals of this quality sell for 50-70 bucks in Barnes and nobles. It’s a very nice and beautiful journal. I left off a star for two reasons. The first is that you cannot erase on this paper. This is my music writing journal so, as you can imagine, I need to cross out or erase a lot. The second more pressing concern is one of the leather straps on the binding is extremely thin, and I’m afraid it will break soon without significant wear. I’ve included a phot to see the thin strap. It is on the bottom in the middle. Other than those two things, great journal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Journal!
customer_reviews.text: I've been in search for a journal just like this and here it is; in the exact form as described from the vendor. I couldn't be more pleased with how timeless it looks... "THANK YOU!" I feel so strongly about its leather presentation and the quality of paper within it that I'm afraid I've become picky inregards to what is worthy of writing in it (LOL).
customer_reviews.author: Jamila Antrice

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the smell when it is pulled from its bag, the paper thickness, the paper design, it all just feels like I'm aboard an old ship, sailing across the Atlantic when I write in it. The only 2 disadvantages: paper is not lined and it is not refillable (or done easily). I can get over the fact the paper isn't lined but just presents an extra challenge for a leftie to write straight which I welcome the challenge, someone else might not.
customer_reviews.author: chili242204

customer_reviews.title: Great little Journal
customer_reviews.text: I was weary of placing an order for this as I thought it would be kind of cheap. I was wrong. This is beautifully crafted and the pages are all handmade.
customer_reviews.author: Grant G.

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my little cousin when she left for college and she loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I see her writing in it from time to time. Pretty sure she's leaving instructions for her two future sons on how to take down a Rougarou or a Wendigo.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Enduring and Old Fashioned, in a wonderful way.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a diary to my niece. She's 12yrs old. I think I saw tears. It's a beautifully crafted item. Solid leather with a leather string wrap binder like the way journals used to be made long ago. It's a perfect gift for deep thinkers, artists, writers, you name it. You can't go wrong buying this.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS E FAGAN

customer_reviews.title: Journal
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for part of the 1st place prize for a dog show event. Owners work very hard with their dogs to achieve this prize, the journal will be used to document the events and journey. The winner was ecstatic, had been looking for a journal like this one. Excellent quality, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy j

customer_reviews.title: You can write on both sides!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my 3rd book. I love that my pen does not bleed thru the page... Allowing me to use both sides. It looks really cool too. My 1st and 3rd purchased books have nice feeling leather. My 2nd book was rather dry... So I oiled it... And while not quite as nice as the others, it still is very nice and would/could definitely make a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed at imperfections yet books are beautiful when right
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I bought because the 1st was am amazingly gorgeous! After waiting over a month for this to arrive, I was so disappointed at the leather and imperfections overall! I honestly want to just return it but dint want to wait another month for a new one! However, the paper is fabulous and the first one is fantastic so I have faith that it was just a defective book.
customer_reviews.author: KatMazon

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made! I'm in love with this journal!
customer_reviews.text: This JOURNAL... it's the perfect size and gives you plenty of pages, I've used watercolors, markers, glue, and acrylics on these well made pages and they don't bleed or bubble, or wrinkle! The craftsmanship is Amazing! WELL DONE!
customer_reviews.author: LeAndria Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Retirement Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful journal. I'm giving it as a gift for a couple who has just retired. The only thing I did not like was that "MOONSTER" is engraved on the back of the journal...this is the name of the Company, but no where is there a picture of the back of the product. I'm sure it will be fine, but when I first opened it, I thought "Monster" / "Moonster"... What's that?! I didn't realize it was the product name until I did a little more research. I'm sure the couple will love it. It would be a nice addition if Moonster offered engraving on the front of the journal ~ Just a thought.
customer_reviews.author: Deb TX

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The journal looks amazing, and it is a good conversation piece. People want to know where I bought it, and makes me look like I'm a fancy writer. wink wink
customer_reviews.author: PJ Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Nice journal. I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this leather journal for my nephew and he hasn’t stopped writing in it. The quality of the leather cover is very sturdy, I was surprised it came in a little bag. Very nice touch there. Even the pages felt sturdy, not that cheap thin paper you’d normally see in notebooks. I’d give it more than 5 stars if I had the option.
customer_reviews.author: M.Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Well-crafted
customer_reviews.text: I’ve decided to start a journal, but I wanted something that was both unique and reminiscent of the past. This notebook is it. The coloring of the genuine leather is beautiful, and the combined smell of the leather and the paper would make Hermione Granger giddy. I bought my first fountain pen as well, and writing in the journal has been nothing short of a pleasure. I’m even writing in cursive again, something I haven’t done in years. Great product, thoughtfully made.
customer_reviews.author: DEW

customer_reviews.title: Over priced for the qulity
customer_reviews.text: The leather is poor quality and very thin. Maybe suitable for a very young person. Highly overrated. If you want to send it back, don't count on a refund. Zero refund and you pay for shipping. I will not by from this vendor ever.
customer_reviews.author: A girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lil book
customer_reviews.text: This book is stunning. I bought it to write letters to my newborn son so I can gift him the book when he's 18 and can read all the letters I've written to him as he's grown up. The pages do bleed through if you use marker but overall this book is perfect, and it smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sosa

product_meta.title: Leather Journal Writing Notebook - Antique Handmade Leather Bound Daily Notepad for Men + Women Unlined Paper 7 x 5 Inches, Perfect Gift for Art Sketchbook, Travel Diary and Notebooks to Write in
feature_bullets: ★ UNLIKE THE DISAPPOINTING FAKE LEATHER JOURNALS MADE BY OTHER BRANDS, Moonster’s leather notebook is made of HAND-CUT, 100% GENUINE WATER BUFFALO LEATHER and premium RECYCLED COTTON PAPER. Handmade in India, our Leather Bound Journal features a BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED, AUTHENTIC DESIGN that will leave its recipients in awe.

★ WHILE MANY FAUX LEATHER JOURNALS ARE CONSTRUCTED POORLY, WITH GLUED-ON BINDINGS AND PAGES THAT FALL OUT, our writing journal is a keepsake you’ll have forever, with a HAND-STITCHED COPTIC LEATHER BINDING for pages that stay firmly in place. Filled with 120 sheets/240 pages of creamy, unlined PREMIUM COTTON PAPER recycled from leftover garment industry cloth in India, our travel journal note book is TREE-FREE AND ACID-FREE. This blank journal LIES FLAT, making it a pleasure to write in.

★ NO BLEED THROUGH: Use any pen on this thick quality paper – EASY FOR HANDWRITING, DRAWING OR SKETCHING and compact for carrying in your bag. IDEAL FOR Artist Sketchbooks, Photo Album, Traveling Notes, Business Executive, Hunting Logbook, Poetry Work, Journalists, DND Notebook, Weekly Food Planner, Instagram Scrapbook and Bible Journaling

★ A HANDSOME, THOUGHTFUL GIFT THAT GIVES BACK. For every purchase made, Moonster gives a percentage of its profits to their favorite charity in Africa, that works to PREVENT AND PROTECT CHILDREN FROM CRUELTY AND ABUSE. Our journal for men & women comes beautifully wrapped in an earth-friendly COTTON BAG. Choose between two sizes: 5”X7” OR 8”x6” – the perfect size for travel! ALSO AVAILABLE IN GIFT SETS (Search: B06XDQG92X)

★ OUR 365-DAY REPLACEMENT PROMISE: If your vintage journal arrives damaged or you find anything faulty with the craftsmanship, simply CONTACT US DIRECTLY within 1 year and we will send you a FREE REPLACEMENT or FULL REFUND. No questions asked, HASSLE-FREE. Makes an Awesome Anniversary, Graduation, Valentine or Birthday Gift! Buying 2, 3 or 4? SAVE UP TO $8.00! SEE ALL OUR DISCOUNTS BELOW.
